q: halftime, when the Nuggets took a 58-43 lead. He came out firing in the second half, scoring 11 points in the first six minutes, including two 3-poiners, to push Denver's lead to 78-51. I got into a rhythm in the second half, said Allen Iverson , who finished 14-for-20 from the field and added eight assists. "The basket looked like an ocean; I was throwing rocks in. It feels good when you catch a rhythm like that."

the first time as a Piston, Allen Iverson scored 17 points and led Detroit to a 107-97 victory over the slumping Milwaukee Bucks. "With everything going on, I wanted to play well," Allen Iverson said. I just wanted to play well. Especially for my teammates because I let them down by not being here. Allen Iverson was benched by Pistons coach Michael Beasley Curry to begin the game, punishment for missing a mandatory team practice on Thanksgiving. urging Mike Pence to run for the presidency is a former deputy counsel to Ronald Reagan and former U.S. Rep. Jim Ryun , R-Kan. Mike Pence said the decision he and his wife will reach will be based on where can we make the most difference for the conservative principles that carried us into public service. It also comes down to where are we needed most. While Mike Pence would be one of numerous Republicans considering presidential campaigns, he would enter a race for governor as the favorite.
